abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the user’s library.
Get the rating for an album in the user’s library.
Add multiple albums to the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Fetch all genres from the user’s library.

Add multiple playlists to the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Access the total number of albums in the user’s library.
